entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda is mentioned as a person who might have spilled the beans to Rita Skeeter. She is described as an old friend of Albus's and a most gifted magical historian.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is mentioned as someone who might have received information from Bathilda. She conducted an interview with hints about an important source close to the Dumbledores.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The Dumbledores are mentioned as being close to Bathilda, and Rita Skeeter's interview hinted at this relationship.

entities.name: doge
entities.description: Doge is mentioned as someone who is skeptical of Bathilda talking to Rita Skeeter. He is described as clutching at Harry's question like a drowning man at a life heir.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is questioning Doge about Bathilda talking to Rita Skeeter. He has a textbook with Bathilda's name on it.

entities.name: auntie muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is mentioned as someone who thinks Bathilda is 'quite gaga these days'.

relationships.description: Bathilda might have spilled the beans to Rita Skeeter, as hinted at in Rita's interview.
The Dumbledores are close to Bathilda, as hinted at in Rita Skeeter's interview.
